sub_title: Mechanical Engineer |Design & Engineering | Automotive | Semiconductor | New Product development | Precision Mechanics | Fluid and Thermal |
summary:
Mechanical Engineer having more than 15 years of Experience in mechanical design of system and subsystem in complex mechanical environment with a focus on precision mechanics & volume production environment in mechanical group. 
Being a keen listener makes me understand Internal/External customer challenges better, bundle that with the wealth of knowledge gained over last 15 years of  experience puts me in a quite capable position to address those challenges.

treasury_media.title: Mars Mission 2022 by ASML Team
treasury_media.description: Winner of Mars Mission 2022, Learning and achievement during excellent Team work!

treasury_media.title: Design Innovation Casting Component : Automotive Design Engineer
treasury_media.description: The Design of casting component for alignment of the Suspension system in the truck. Bracket uses for suspension system mounting with Axles. Till Now Axle welded brackets are used but exclusively for New suspension system this bolted bracket is designed. It has 2 half; upper Sheetmetal bracket & Lower Casting bracket. Torque calculation is done for bolts so that preload withstand with deformation of bracket during application of torque. DOE performed on sets of brackets.

projects.title: 3FM - Zeiss Lens Checking Machine Tool Development
projects.description:
Tool Development 
-Tool Concept design and Detail design for High precision machine assembly 
-Tool design has High Requirements Stiffness during the Build up of machine in clean room 
-Design and Developed Highly stiff Tool for High precision Machine build up in clean room
-Calculation for Mechanical stiffness in done in NX Nastran Tool
-Participated in assembly sequence of complex machine and suggested design changes to avoid complex tooling for machine
-Project is successfully completed with release of of TPD ( drawings)

projects.title: Lift Suspension Design (6T)
projects.description:

Close interaction with supplier for costing (understanding of process cost), Develop Strong SAP (PP Module) Knowledge, Engineering Representation in Production meeting for assembly issues, Product quality supervision.

profile_positions.description:
•Concept ideation for YS500 WS-F&T Module based on requirements 
•Align with architect for defining requirement specification
•Lead Concept ideation & Make concept trade off, review and make choice
•Design of Sheetmetal component holding manifold with precision 
•Design of cable slab module in wafer stage 
•Deign of hose routing, strain relief bracket, water manifolds
•Design & development of Feed through box from machine to vacuum environment  
•Design of O-ring interface, compression fittings choices, Fluid & thermal Infra
•Tolerance stack up for critical tolerances 
•Interface agreement with stake holder 
•Serviceability checks for design
•Qualification test definition for module
•Static stiffness calculation, compression of O-ring, pull out forces on clamp block
•Review design with cable slab competence, Water leak tight competence
•Volume creation and conflict resolution
•Interaction with supplier for component and ASSY 
•Worked with agile scrum methods within project
•Give input for planning milestone : critical design review, preliminary design review

profile_positions.title: Senior Mechanical Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Multi Beam Inspection Machine - Wafer Stage Development (MBI-WS) & Feed through Box (application  Ultra deep Vacuum) Fluid & Thermal Layout, Concept Design, Detail Design and Development (F&T).
- Responsible for Design of Wafer Stage Fluid and Thermal Infrastructure in Ultra Deep Vacuum.
- Design based on complex Layout, Vacuum Based design, Serviceability, Cost, testing 
- Responsible for Design and Development of F&T Parts in Machine ( Feed through box to Module) 
- Design and Development of Feed through Box.
- Participating in Qualification of Water Leak tight System and Vacuum tight Feed through Box (pressure drop & pressure proof test, helium leak test)
- Monitoring the assembly build & Leak testing for Water & Vacuum in Clean room

profile_positions.description:
Suspension Systems Design (Mechanical System)
• Manage New product Development Concept design till production (Complete Product life cycle)

• Design Mechanical Component to achieve performance specification
• Create Test Cases for Rig validation & Proto Test for Proto test path. Monitor Failure in Rig/proto test.

profile_positions.title: Senior Mechanical Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
New Product Development (EURO-6 ): 
• Responsible for preparing project input to drive initial design concepts based on functional requirements.   
• To co-ordinate kick off meetings with stakeholder for input clarification, technical requirements, desired output clarifications.
• Responsible for concept design & complete structural design with the fulfillment of technical requirements documentation (TPD) & load sustainability of structure design (Analysis). 
• Involved in a training of new engineers joining the design department and active member of continuous improvement team. Also assigned with the task of checking the design made by juniors.
• Implementation of DFSS process (QFD/Design Review/DOE/Mock-up) in development Phase
• Manage the supplier development process to safeguard requirements, planning, cost and document flow
